text: Autopsy is an American death metal band from Concord, California. Autopsy has four members in the band; the current band members are Chris Reifert, Danny Coralles, Eric Cutler and Joe Trevisano. == Band members == ;Current *Chris Reifert – drums/vocals (1987–present) *Danny Coralles – guitar (1987–present) *Eric Cutler – guitar (1987–present) *Joe Trevisano - bass (2010–present) ;Former *Eric Eigard – bass (1987–1988) *Ken Sorvari – bass (1988) *Steve Cutler – bass (1990–1991) *Josh Barohn – bass (1991–1993) *Freeway Migliore – bass (1993–1995) *Dan Lilker - bass (the 2010 Maryland Deathfest Show) == Discography == So far as of 2011, Autopsy has released 5 Studio albums: ===Albums=== *Severed Survival (1989) *Mental Funeral (1991) *Acts of the Unspeakable (1992) *Shitfun (1995) *Macabre Eternal (2011) ==References== == Other websites == *Official Myspace Category:Death metal bands Category:Musical groups from California Category:Concord, California Category:Musical groups established in 1987 Category:1987 establishments in California Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1995 Category:1995 disestablishments in the United States Category:1990s disestablishments in California Category:Musical groups established in 2008 Category:2008 establishments in California Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2008 Category:2008 disestablishments in the United States Category:2000s disestablishments in California Category:Musical groups established in 2009 Category:2009 establishments in California
title: Autopsy (band)
